job_tasks.phrase: deploy/roll out the AI solutions of your colleagues/the AI solution made together with your colleagues in a scalable and secure way
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the deployment and rollout of AI solutions, which falls under building and integrating AI features into applications.

job_tasks.phrase: further scale these applications and help build new AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: Scaling applications and building new AI solutions are core software development activities in the context of integrating AI.

job_tasks.phrase: You provide a clear vision of the required Cloud architecture and manage it for our AI solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Managing cloud architecture for AI solutions is a key aspect of MLOps and operationalizing AI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy
job_tasks.justification: Making solutions production-worthy involves the software development practices to ensure readiness for live environments.
Bringing solutions to production directly aligns with the operationalization and deployment aspects of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Exploring and applying new technology plays an important role.
job_tasks.justification: While broad, exploring and applying new technology in the context of AI solutions often involves implementing them through software development.

job_tasks.phrase: investigate with your colleagues which new techniques are applicable within our company
job_tasks.justification: Investigating and determining applicability of new techniques often leads to their implementation via software development.

soft_skills.phrase: Exploring and applying new technology plays an important role

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and scaling applications using LLMs, a core responsibility of a GenAI Engineer. It also highlights bringing AI solutions to production and exploring new techniques, aligning with the profile's focus on user-facing systems and generative models.
